{"id":700584589,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1652691300,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/700584589/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    bool dfs(TreeNode* root,TreeNode* curr,int k)\n    {\n        if(curr==NULL)\n            return false;\n        return (search(root,curr,k-curr->val)||dfs(root,curr->left,k)|| dfs(root,root->right,k));\n    }\n    \n    bool search(TreeNode* root,TreeNode* curr, int value)\n    {\n        if(root==NULL)\n            return false;\n        return (root->val == value) && (curr!=root) || (root->val<value) && search(root->right,curr,value)\n            || (root->val>value)&& search(root->left,curr,value);\n    }\n    \n    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {\n        return dfs(root,root,k);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
